item.title: Chipotle is Opening Over 100 New Drive-Thru Lnaes At Restaurant Locations So You Can Get Guac On-The-Go

image.title: Chipotle is Opening Over 100 New Drive-Thru Lnaes At Restaurant Locations So You Can Get Guac On-The-Go

item.title: Chipotle CEO believes digital growth will continue even after pandemic
item.description: CEO Brian Niccol says he is very optimistic on the digital growth of its business, which has boomed during the pandemic. He says prior to the pandemic 80 percent of its business was in-store while 20 percent was digital. Now, that number is close to a 50-50 split. He joins ‘Closing Bell’ to discuss his outlook on the restaurant industry.

item.title: Chipotle’s New Protein Is a Twist on an Old Favorite
item.description: Chipotle excels at chicken, and the new pollo asado is no exception.
